channel.title: Himat版 Steam 新規ストア公開（画像＋説明）
channel.description: Games whose Steam store page just went public (detected)

item.title: ReUse（新規追加）
item.description: Fancy a shoot’em all with a little bit of resource management. Join Theo on his perseverance to kill monsters by crafting deadly weapons using whatever he can scavenge from his surroundings.
item.content:encoded:
Fancy a shoot’em all with a little bit of resource management. Join Theo on his perseverance to kill monsters by crafting deadly weapons using whatever he can scavenge from his surroundings.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Before They Catch Us（新規追加）
item.description: A dark text-based RPG in which the world is consumed by an eternal race for survival. An inexorable mushroom forest corrupted all life on planet. And you are a prophet's disciple leading your clan to survival... or oblivion. Interpret misty visions, make important choices, do everything to survive.
item.content:encoded:
A dark text-based RPG in which the world is consumed by an eternal race for survival. An inexorable mushroom forest corrupted all life on planet. And you are a prophet's disciple leading your clan to survival... or oblivion. Interpret misty visions, make important choices, do everything to survive.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Urbexophobia（新規追加）
item.description: Urbexophobia is a survival horror game for 1 to 4 players. Urban exploration used to be a thrill. Tonight, it’s a trap. Search, survive, and face your fears—alone or with others.Just remember one thing: You control nothing.
item.content:encoded:
Urbexophobia is a survival horror game for 1 to 4 players. Urban exploration used to be a thrill. Tonight, it’s a trap. Search, survive, and face your fears—alone or with others.Just remember one thing: You control nothing.

item.title: Office of Interstellar Production（新規追加）
item.description: Take the reins of the newly founded Office of Interstellar Production, annex newly discovered star systems, mine resources and refine quality components to build mighty warships to deliver to the unceasing needs of the Navy. A chill sandbox resource management game.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Real Puzzles - Kittens（新規追加）
item.description: A logical puzzle game in the form of real puzzles - cute kittens. It is necessary to assemble a whole picture from its individual pieces. The game is suitable for those who are looking for a calm and relaxing pastime with family or alone.
item.content:encoded:
A logical puzzle game in the form of real puzzles - cute kittens. It is necessary to assemble a whole picture from its individual pieces. The game is suitable for those who are looking for a calm and relaxing pastime with family or alone.

item.title: Gran Theft Lure（新規追加）
item.description: Gran Theft Lure is a top-down arena shooter roguelite in which you play as your lovely gran being attacked by hordes of burglars. They can only be killed by luring or pushing them into your garden’s traps. Choose one of the 4 weapon modes, and make them taste theft lure, or should we say failure!
item.content:encoded:
Gran Theft Lure is a top-down arena shooter roguelite in which you play as your lovely gran being attacked by hordes of burglars. They can only be killed by luring or pushing them into your garden’s traps. Choose one of the 4 weapon modes, and make them taste theft lure, or should we say failure!

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Captain Gazman Day Of The Rage Soundtrack - Music From The Trailers（新規追加）
item.description: Contains all the music used in this game's trailers. Also doubles as a donate button - by purchasing this exact OST, you are sponsoring the authors of the game personally (30%) and the creation of Captain Gazman 2: Dawn Of The Rage (70%).
item.content:encoded:
Contains all the music used in this game's trailers. Also doubles as a donate button - by purchasing this exact OST, you are sponsoring the authors of the game personally (30%) and the creation of Captain Gazman 2: Dawn Of The Rage (70%).

item.title: Lunarity（新規追加）
item.description: Management life-sim where you become a magical girl and raise gem bunnies on your own moon. Make them happy and they will reward you with power. Complete cute bunny puzzles to grow your magical abilities. Attend Lunarium academy to learn new spells and bond with fellow magical girls.
item.content:encoded:
Management life-sim where you become a magical girl and raise gem bunnies on your own moon. Make them happy and they will reward you with power. Complete cute bunny puzzles to grow your magical abilities. Attend Lunarium academy to learn new spells and bond with fellow magical girls.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Polyopolis（新規追加）
item.description: Stamp out a thriving city by fitting shapes into a ever-changing grid to attain the most resources. Chain buildings to boost energy, people and products, gain gold coins, and unlock rare stamps in this zen-meets-strategy city builder.
item.content:encoded:
Stamp out a thriving city by fitting shapes into a ever-changing grid to attain the most resources. Chain buildings to boost energy, people and products, gain gold coins, and unlock rare stamps in this zen-meets-strategy city builder.

item.title: ARK Axiom（新規追加）
item.description: ARK Axiom is a narrative-driven, turn-based RPG where player choices affect both story and gameplay. Players abandon one path and embrace another, unlocking varying abilities, altering party dynamics, and reshaping the world itself.
item.content:encoded:
ARK Axiom is a narrative-driven, turn-based RPG where player choices affect both story and gameplay. Players abandon one path and embrace another, unlocking varying abilities, altering party dynamics, and reshaping the world itself.

item.title: Tronix Carnival Games（新規追加）
item.description: Tronix Carnival Games is a rogue-like TPS gameplay in a dystopian robotic world. Set in a ruined carnival overtaken by Tronix robots, it’s now a deadly playground. Players uncover its secrets, battle enemies, and survive unique challenges.
item.content:encoded:
Tronix Carnival Games is a rogue-like TPS gameplay in a dystopian robotic world. Set in a ruined carnival overtaken by Tronix robots, it’s now a deadly playground. Players uncover its secrets, battle enemies, and survive unique challenges.

item.title: Plebs Demo（新規追加）
item.description: Plebs is a casual real time strategy game about controlling ancient Nations to victory through strategic town building, creating mighty and diverse armies, and intelligent resource management. Battle through the Campaign, Survive endless waves of enemies, or Skirmish on a variety of levels.
item.content:encoded:
Plebs is a casual real time strategy game about controlling ancient Nations to victory through strategic town building, creating mighty and diverse armies, and intelligent resource management. Battle through the Campaign, Survive endless waves of enemies, or Skirmish on a variety of levels.

item.title: NectorX（新規追加）
item.description: NectorX is an arcade rail shooter inspired by games from the 80s and 90s. Control a spaceship and fight against rogue machines.

NectorX is an arcade rail shooter inspired by games from the 80s and 90s. Control a spaceship and fight against rogue machines.

item.title: Cruft OST（新規追加）
item.description: The CRUFT OST is just as goofy as the game... but never off-beat. Each track is a certified banger. Pop in these tracks when you're gonna clean up your home and you'll be done in no time.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Slither Link Plus（新規追加）
item.description: SlitherLink Plus is a logic puzzle game where you draw a single loop using number clues. Play on square, hexagonal, kite, and Cairo tiling grids—each with unique logic and challenge. Includes varied levels and infinite puzzles to test your reasoning.
item.content:encoded:
SlitherLink Plus is a logic puzzle game where you draw a single loop using number clues. Play on square, hexagonal, kite, and Cairo tiling grids—each with unique logic and challenge. Includes varied levels and infinite puzzles to test your reasoning.

item.title: Night Turns to Day（新規追加）
item.description: Night Turns to Day is an indie point and click horror game where the player has to manage resources and complete various tasks to fend off enemies in order to survive. The game offers high intense action and thrilling gameplay, with many secrets waiting to be discovered.
item.content:encoded:
Night Turns to Day is an indie point and click horror game where the player has to manage resources and complete various tasks to fend off enemies in order to survive. The game offers high intense action and thrilling gameplay, with many secrets waiting to be discovered.

item.title: Prime Account Upgrade（新規追加）
item.description: This package upgrades your account to Prime status. Prime players are matched exclusively with each other. Instantly receive 500 Wishstones, a permanent 1-slot expansion for your Secure Pouch, and support items to aid your growth.
item.content:encoded:
This package upgrades your account to Prime status. Prime players are matched exclusively with each other. Instantly receive 500 Wishstones, a permanent 1-slot expansion for your Secure Pouch, and support items to aid your growth.

item.title: Crazy Pipes 3D（新規追加）
item.description: In this fast-paced 3D puzzle game, connect pipes before time runs out, while avoiding obstacles and dynamites. Boost your score by using more pipes. Advance in the Normal mode with growing challenges or play randomly generated puzzles in the timer-less Endless mode.
item.content:encoded:
In this fast-paced 3D puzzle game, connect pipes before time runs out, while avoiding obstacles and dynamites. Boost your score by using more pipes. Advance in the Normal mode with growing challenges or play randomly generated puzzles in the timer-less Endless mode.

item.title: Lustful Heist（新規追加）
item.description: Lustful Heist is a harem-focused adult game with action and intense choices. As an amateur racer drawn into the criminal world, you must decide whether to dive deeper into crime or try to pull your new crew out. Your decisions shape your fate and lead to various outcomes.
item.content:encoded:
Lustful Heist is a harem-focused adult game with action and intense choices. As an amateur racer drawn into the criminal world, you must decide whether to dive deeper into crime or try to pull your new crew out. Your decisions shape your fate and lead to various outcomes.

item.title: Saccharine（新規追加）
item.description: From the creators of Project Absentia, Saccharine is a tasty FPS throwback of the violent sort to Christmas specials of days gone by. Play as Sanya Vaffelzscki as she kicks terrorist ass and tries to visit her friends out west.
item.content:encoded:

item.description: Play as night guard Derrick Wolfe. Caught art-thief Vanessa Bloom red-handed - interrogate her, solve the photo-puzzle, and unlock an exclusive intimate session. No mercy, no second chance.

item.title: SHOTGUN DREAMS（新規追加）
item.description: SHOTGUNS DREAMS is a first-person 3D platformer with an emphasis on momentum and creativity. Utilize simple parkour abilities like sliding and wall-running to maintain top speed. Leverage shell pickups to gain velocity, teleport, and manipulate gravity. How you reach the goal is up to you.
item.content:encoded:
SHOTGUNS DREAMS is a first-person 3D platformer with an emphasis on momentum and creativity. Utilize simple parkour abilities like sliding and wall-running to maintain top speed. Leverage shell pickups to gain velocity, teleport, and manipulate gravity. How you reach the goal is up to you.

item.title: Camp（新規追加）
item.description: Tense moments, a gripping story and the dark side of the deep rainforest make the game "Camp" an unforgettable experience. Are you ready for an adventure full of challenging puzzles, dangerous enemies and surprises? You must do your best to save your friends and survive!
item.content:encoded:
Tense moments, a gripping story and the dark side of the deep rainforest make the game "Camp" an unforgettable experience. Are you ready for an adventure full of challenging puzzles, dangerous enemies and surprises? You must do your best to save your friends and survive!

item.title: Find Meow in Dwarf Mines（新規追加）
item.description: Find Meow in Dwarf Mines is a cozy hidden object game where you explore hand-drawn Dwarf Mines to find 100 charming cats, each one carefully hidden and full of personality. Funds raised from selling this game will be spent on saving lifes of our little friends.
item.content:encoded:
Find Meow in Dwarf Mines is a cozy hidden object game where you explore hand-drawn Dwarf Mines to find 100 charming cats, each one carefully hidden and full of personality. Funds raised from selling this game will be spent on saving lifes of our little friends.

item.title: Fantasy Grounds - The Black Spot（新規追加）
item.description: The first mate drew his blade and formed up what was left of the crew. They steeled their courage and waited for whatever nightmare gave birth to the horrid noises below deck to emerge topside. When the creatures finally ventured into the moonlight, the men's courage broke. They had never seen such otherworldly monstrosities.
item.content:encoded:
The first mate drew his blade and formed up what was left of the crew. They steeled their courage and waited for whatever nightmare gave birth to the horrid noises below deck to emerge topside. When the creatures finally ventured into the moonlight, the men's courage broke. They had never seen such otherworldly monstrosities.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Reign of Legends（新規追加）
item.description: Command your troops amidst the flames of war in the Three Kingdoms era! Dominate the land and forge a new legend! This is an idle/incremental game set against the backdrop of the Three Kingdoms. Collect legendary heroes and command them in battle to restore the glory of the Han Dynasty!
item.content:encoded:
Command your troops amidst the flames of war in the Three Kingdoms era! Dominate the land and forge a new legend! This is an idle/incremental game set against the backdrop of the Three Kingdoms. Collect legendary heroes and command them in battle to restore the glory of the Han Dynasty!

item.title: Fantasy Grounds - Traveller - The Fifth Frontier War: The Riverland（新規追加）
item.description: The Fifth Frontier War: The Riverland The Imperial Navy has been driven from the Jewell system, opening the way for Consulate forces to advance all across the Riverland Front. Paving the way for that advance is a team of Zhodani-aligned intelligence operatives tasked with fostering rebellion and mayhem on the Spinward Main.
item.content:encoded:
The Fifth Frontier War: The Riverland The Imperial Navy has been driven from the Jewell system, opening the way for Consulate forces to advance all across the Riverland Front. The Primal Vanquisher pack grants you power drawn not only from beast and earth—but from the dark rites whispered by those who walked alone in the wild. Cloaked in feathers, bone, and rune-marked steel, you stride the path of the hunter, the seer, and the soulbound.

item.title: Fantasy Grounds - Eye of Itral（新規追加）
item.description: The Eye of Itral is a "film noir" type adventure set in the town of Cat's Cradle, written by Ken Spencer. Mysteries and secrets abound, and some of them can be very, very dangerous... This book is intended to be used in tandem with the Cat's Cradle Sourcebook, also published by Frog God Games.
item.content:encoded:
The Eye of Itral is a "film noir" type adventure set in the town of Cat's Cradle, written by Ken Spencer. Mysteries and secrets abound, and some of them can be very, very dangerous... This book is intended to be used in tandem with the Cat's Cradle Sourcebook, also published by Frog God Games.

item.description: Ascend to sacred heights with the Primal Legend pack, a tribute to the lost Temple of Eterra, a place where marble halls shimmered with blue light, and life was shaped by divine hands. These cosmetics embody reverence, strength, and the serene legacy of creation itself.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Fractala Sandbox（新規追加）
item.description: Explore the elements of Fractala Sandbox and its large-scale physics-based simulation. A pure sandbox experience featuring everything from wavy water and sticky slime to viscous lava, coiling honey, squishy jelly, compressible snow, piling sand, aerodynamics, solids, rope, fire, and explosives!
item.content:encoded:
Explore the elements of Fractala Sandbox and its large-scale physics-based simulation. A pure sandbox experience featuring everything from wavy water and sticky slime to viscous lava, coiling honey, squishy jelly, compressible snow, piling sand, aerodynamics, solids, rope, fire, and explosives!

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Last Epoch - Primal Traveler Supporter Pack（新規追加）
item.description: The Primal Traveler pack invites you to walk among the echoes of a forgotten past, where weapons were forged with bone and stone, where beasts were both companions and guides, and primal magic surged through every feather, claw, and rune.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Dota 2（新規追加）

item.content:encoded:
